recipesJson.name: W.C. Peppermintington Cookies!
recipesJson.author: Fear
recipesJson.description:
This is a steeper. I took one for science and tried the iterations day by day. Sometimes I can SnV CAP Sugar Cookie, sometimes not.

So, recipe is pretty straight forward and does not need a ton of explanation. 

LB WCP Super good you should have it if you enjoy that profile, it is good.
CAP Sugar Cookie, yeah, cookie
JF Biscuit, wanted to crisp up the cookie without adding AP, this worked well for me.
INW Shisha Vanilla, used for both the cookie and to prop up the white chocolate against the bakery.
CAP SS, it's a cookie, put sugar in it. You can sub this, or leave this out. Your juice, your choice. The mix is not as good without it and I have no idea how TFA Sweetener will effect it with it's maltol.

reviews.text: Very good recipe, my girlfriend vape 100ml per week of this stuff! Very well balanced very flavorful = super tasty!
Super tasty and accurate translation of the cookies. OM NOM NOM
This is really nice, it goes down easy and has a very reminiscent flavor, no off notes here it tastes like your home for the holidays! Great job thanks!

For not a tobacco, this is great! ;) Mixed this up, as my wife loves peppermint/mint vapes quite a bit. I'm not normally a fan. The peppermint/white chocolate is just an amazing flavor, and its sooooo good. The cookie base here just works to give a nice, simple, and tasty base for this to lay on. Let it set for a bit, and I fell in love. My wife loves it as well. Have already made her several batches, and she keeps asking for more.
Blown away by how good this recipe is. Really shows what lb white  chocolate peppermint can do. Very smooth and perfectly balanced best lb wcp recipe to date. Thank you fear!
